Dark One/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror:  

::Dark One nods::
<Understood, Zardus>
================

::Double Punch ducked, the fire bombs missing his head, a chunk of the boulder
 protecting him blowing out::

::Injector and Manterror's own boulders were broken apart::

::Injector looked to Hell Beast::
"I'd prefer we not set up a perimeter guard.  I am in need of repairs, and 
I'm surprised Double Punch and Manterror are still functioning!"
::All three head for the CR chambers::

=================
